help pl0x. my subtitles are REALLY small, barely possible to read them, vlc settings at max for subs wont make it better, what should i do?
Solved the problem myself, for some time. if some1 having a similar problem with the subtitles,settings>inputs/codecs>subtitles>****coding:ISO-8859-2

+ use advanced settings. 
DAMN I WANT AN "EDIT" OPTION xD

..or simply use media player classic+cccp for a much better result..........I wish some1 would have told me that earlier -.-
